```{r}
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
DB_PATH <- "data/h4sci.sqlite3"
con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), DB_PATH)

response <- dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM responses")

dbDisconnect(con)

```



## General 

```{r}
g <- gsub(",,",",",paste(response$general,collapse=","))
wc <- quanteda::dfm(unlist(strsplit(g,",")))
quanteda::textplot_wordcloud(wc,min_count = 1,color = rev(viridisLite::viridis(5)))

```
